author: cms-sw
body:
Fixes https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw-config/issues/93
This change allows inverted logic for alpaka backends e.g.
```
<flags ALPAKA_BACKENDS="!serial"/>
```
will build for all selected alpaka backends except for `serial`.
```
<flags ALPAKA_BACKENDS="!serial rocm"/>
```
will build for all selected alpaka backends except for `serial and rocm`.
title: support inverted logic for alpaka backends
